page.title: 20EDUCATION.
page.content: Until 1962 Education in "All Age Primaries"(5-15)then St.Stephen in Brannel Sec.School opened,Head T.J Wallis,for pupils 11-15years.Large school intake 373,growing to maximum 727 pupils.Staff came from village schools,Foxhole Woodwork Centre,Dom. Science Centre Nanpean and from other parts of the country.First Ch of Govs Mrs.E.Clyma,Ch.again this year.Other Gov.appointments 1962 still serving- Mrs Pascoe,Mr.Annear.Comprehensive Sch.status 1971.Raising of the Sch. Leaving Age and extensions 1972.More extensions 1978.1985,pupils 640,staff 36.Two original non-teaching staff from 1962,Mrs B.Wallis,secretary Mrs. Webb,canteen supervisor. Built and opened in 1984,new Primary School replaces old premises,now to be used for Community purposes.
